```{r}
# CHUNK 1
1 + 1
```


```{r}
# CHUNK 2
a <- 1 + 1
a
(a <- 1 + 1)

A  # not the same as a
```


```{r}
# CHUNK 3
b <- 1
class(b)

c <- 1L
class(c)
```


```{r}
# CHUNK 4
d <- "I love you!"
d
class(d)

e <- "123"  # character data, not numeric data
e
class(e)
```


```{r}
# CHUNK 5
1 < 2
class(1 < 2)

TRUE * 3   # equal to 1 * 3
FALSE + 4  # equal to 0 + 4

T          # equal to TRUE
F          # equal to FALSE
T <- 100   # override T by another value
T
```
